name: Block (DaMan56100)
description:
GitHub repositary: https://github.com/DaMan56100/Block-OJ2018

Click on the background, don't click the blocks, carefully spam to a higher score!

Programmed using the .NET framework, most code written over the past few days.  Has been fun making most of the requisites, display, and the result looks quite clean.

Pretty much my first venture into creating a full game. I know it doesn't have a lot of depth, but I'm pretty new to this. This experience will be valuable in future years, as I can get more accustomed to creating an actual product (and not just some hypothetical in a Computer Science class)

Hope you all enjoy :)
